issues.description: Missing location information for the role of Director-General of the World Trade Organization.
Multiple time markers provided but no clear start and end dates for the position, making temporal coherence verification difficult.
Missing location information for the role of envoy for virus support.
Only a single time marker provided, making it difficult to verify the duration of the role.
